Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ WorldRobot() [1/2]

vision_filter::WorldRobot::WorldRobot ( )

Creates an invalid world robot. This is so the World can create a full list of robots without dealing with holes It's a little less efficient, but it makes things much cleaner code-wise
